testcase.name: Verify User able to retrieve the existing job description
testcase.system-out: * def data = read('classpath:com/noorteck/qa/data/JobAPI_TestData.json') .. passed * def filename = env == 'scrum' ? 'classpath:com/noorteck/qa/helper/Headers.feature@valid-auth' : 'classpath:com/noorteck/qa/helper/Headers.feature@no-auth' . passed * def info = call read(filename) .......................................... passed * def URL = baseUrl ....................................................... passed * configure headers = info.HEADER ......................................... passed * def PATH = findAPI ...................................................... passed Given params {id: '#(data.scrum[0].jobId)', jobTitle: '#(data.scrum[0].jobTitle)'} . passed And url URL ............................................................... passed And path PATH ............................................................. passed When method GET ........................................................... passed * print response .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response.jobId == data.scrum[0].jobId ........................... passed And match response.jobTitle == data.scrum[0].jobTitle ..................... passed And match response.project[0].projectName == data.scrum[0].projectName .... passed
